resources.string: In order to continue, you must update Samsung Cares now. This should only take a few moments.
Sorry, the requested application could not be launched.
An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again later.
A network connection is required to complete this task. Please connect to a Wi-Fi or data network.
Are you sure you want to exit the application?
If you are calling in regards to the phone you are currently using, please call
from an alternate device to that Samsung can provide you with the best troubleshooting experience.
